ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] ok here we go agian...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, I wouldn t Power lvl a caster. In my opnion, you need to be working on your spell skills and power lvling will get you past your skill and your spells
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, I wouldn't Power lvl a caster. In my opnion, you need to be working on your spell skills and power lvling will get you past your skill and your spells will fizzle alot. Just what I learned the hard way. Hope it helps.

 



"Gerry (Jerry)" <godsmacksonlyfan@...> wrote:

hey fellow EQ addics,

I have a LVL 10 Shammy and would like help lvling up...i heard about
pling and want to know how that is done. I am new to eq so i dont
have much money...whats the best way to get some...My toons name is
Hunl...the server i play on is...The Nameless or something along
those lines...maybe thats the name of the guild i see all the
time...but it does start with "The". Send me a tell if ur on when i
am if u'd like to group or help out a n00b.

Hunl of the Guild Idenity Crises. (oh i can't spell sry)
